Articles.Content: I am having the hardest time figuring out where I can go to get 1.1.2. I have tried the website and the launcher. Nothing. I click the Turbo Charged link in the launcher, but the page on the website does not have an option for update to 1.1.2.

Welcome aboard!

If you bought from the KSP website, got to https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/ and enter your email and password, then click the "My Account" button, then "Download" next to your purchase info. This will take you to the page where you can pick which version of KSP to download.

Don't bother with the launcher, it's not working properly at the moment.

I bought the Steam key version from the KSP website store......so I'm assuming I can't do this? The early access version on steam only goes to 1.1.0.1228.

Edited May 15, 2016 by Colince411
If you are on Steam you should opt out of the early release version, then you'll get 1.1.2.
